title: Exciting India
overview: K-POP is rocking the world! However, there is a country where K-POP fever hasn't landed yet. That is with 1.2 billion people—about one-sixth of the world's population—an emerging cultural powerhouse, India! South Korea's hottest K-POP stars will make star correspondents to cover news articles for News 9 about K-POP and its potential popularity in India.
